title: Cambodian Flooding
description: In mid-August 2011, unusually heavy rains over the upper Mekong River in Laos and Thailand led to severe flooding in Cambodia. According to the Phnom Penh Post, thousands of people had been left homeless from rising flood waters. Vegetation is displayed in red, bare ground is light brown, and water is black or dark green where it is relatively clear, and green-blue where it carries large amounts of sediment.
theme:
